description: List key result changes with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Read-only access is delegated to the related key result; the user must be authorized to view the linked key result (via the key result policy scope, which is scoped through its objective).
validation_notes: Filters key-result, objective, broker, and changed-by accept comma-separated IDs. organization must be in the format Type|ID (e.g., Broker|123). created-at-min/created-at-max and updated-at-min/updated-at-max must be ISO 8601 timestamps.

flags.name: --key-result
flags.description: Filter by key result ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of key result IDs.

flags.name: --objective
flags.description: Filter by objective ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --organization
flags.description: Filter by organization (format: Type|ID, e.g., Broker|123)

flags.name: --broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --changed-by
flags.description: Filter by changed by user ID (comma-separated for multiple)
